basics.name: Hanieh Mashayekhi
basics.title: IT Engineering Student
basics.summary: IT Engineering student with a strong, active technical skillset in Python, SQL, and automation (Go/Bash), focused on data-driven process improvement. This technical foundation is enhanced by a Masters in Education, giving me the advanced communication and collaborative abilities essential for successful engagement with non-technical shopfloor teams. I am eager to learn quickly and adapt to tools like Databricks and UiPath to create measurable value in production efficiency.

details: Building foundational knowledge in C Programming and Engineering Mathematics, applied alongside core data skills like Python and SQL for process development.

Actively participating in the intensive Kood Sisu program, focusing on practical skills like Go, Bash scripting, Git/Code Review, and automation, demonstrating a strong aptitude for quick technical learning and teamwork.
Provides advanced abilities in communication and teaching, perfect for collaborating effectively with non-technical shopfloor personnel and translating complex data insights.
2 years of volunteering in the tenant board, rewarded as the best tenant board in Finland.
Contributed as part of the project team.
One-day event to familiarize beginners with Python.
